item.title: Lit Study
item.description: I am meant to be writing some report on the literature in the field of computer science, with specialization in programming language theory. There are many things that I could potentially write on, but the particularities of the subject are yet unclear (I should have buckled-down on this two weeks ago, but it’s fiiine) My supervisor presented me with a couple conferences (ICFP, PLDI) wherein I should find some inspiration for papers to read and report
